name: Rain
0:
”Alexa, open Rain Sounds”
”Alexa, play Rain Sounds”
”Alexa, ask Rain Sounds to play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rain sounds
des: The Rain Sounds sleep aid is brought to you by one of the world’s top sleep and relaxation artists. This ultra premium rain sound is taken directly from the album “Rain Sound” which is used by thousands to aid in sleep and relaxation each night. Now, for the first time, the relaxation power of Rain is available on your Alexa device. Rain Sounds is specifically engineered to help you get to and stay asleep by using a custom equalized recording of a real Rain. HOW TO USE: To use Rain Sounds: Say “Alexa, Play Rain Sounds” Once running, Rain Sounds will automatically loop all night, or until you say 'Alexa, stop'. UNINTERUPTED PLAY: Rain Sounds premium service includes all night play (5hr instead of 1hr loops) and high quality sound.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
